definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: My son, Douglas, loves to play with toy guns.
sentences.chinese: 儿子道格拉斯酷爱玩具枪。

sentences.english: Aiming your toy gun at others is also not good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 把玩具枪对准别人也是不好的行为。

sentences.english: They are playing war games with toy guns and toy tanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在用玩具枪和玩具坦克玩战争游戏。

sentences.english: I don't allow my children to play with toy guns.
sentences.chinese: 我不让自己的孩子玩玩具枪。

sentences.english: Boys should be allowed to play with toy guns at nursery school, says the British government.
sentences.chinese: 英国政府表示，托儿所应允许男孩玩玩具枪。

sentences.english: There were children running all over the place , popping off toy guns.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们到处奔跑，劈里啪啦地放着玩具枪。

sentences.english: The children were running about popping off their toy guns.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们奔跑着，劈哩啪啦地放玩具枪。

sentences.english: G1: Have you got toy machine-guns for boys?
sentences.chinese: 你们有男孩玩的机械玩具枪吗？

sentences.english: They are not playing war games dawn toy guns or toy tanks.
sentences.chinese: 她们正在用玩具枪和玩具坦克玩战争游戏。

sentences.english: Palestinian boy plays with his toy rifle in the Shatila refugee camp in Beirut, October 17, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 这个巴斯坦男孩在难民营玩他的来福玩具枪。

sentences.english: Exp: They are playing war games with toy guns and toy tanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在用玩具枪和玩具坦克玩战争游戏。

definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
rifle (loanword)/also written 來復槍|来复枪
